reference.title: Cerberus Supply List
reference.shortdesc: This list shows the crate, food, and chew toys Cerberus currently uses. Each item includes a brand name and an Amazon link for convenience.

ul.li: Suggested: Dog Crate, Travel Dog Kennel Double Door Collapsible, XL 42" x 31" x 31" - Amazon Basics Store View on Amazon

section.title: Note
section.note: Amazon links may change or go out of stock. If a link no longer works, search for the brand name and product description on Amazon or a trusted pet retailer.
